{"name": "BronxWorks Morris Older Adult Center ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Appointments are given in 15-minute intervals. Only 20 appointments are given daily.

Seniors and community members must call 718.933.5300 for an appointment (date and time) for pantry pick-up. Once you are outside (Morris Ave. side) to pick up, call 718.933.5300 to let staff know you have arrived.

Distribution method is subject to change.

Referrals must speak with Maria Rivera, BronxWorks Vice President, Services For Older Adults, for approval.", "email": "", "url": "https://bronxworks.org/our-services/benefits-and-other-assistance/food-pantries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "80 East 181st Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Fordham Heights", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10453", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8549764, "longitude": -73.9043377}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 933-5300", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Help with social services/public benefits"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
